```{r}
library("csv")
asana <- read.csv("asana.csv")

# Take a sample of all asana
s <- sample(nrow(asana), 12)
asana[sort(s),1:3]
```

# Target areas for today's sequence
```{r}
plot(asana[sort(s),4], col=rainbow(20), las=2)
```

# Target areas for the entire asana library
```{r}
plot(asana[,4], col=rainbow(20), las=2)
```
